outputs.output_descr: This Project strengthens and promotes international and multi-country cooperation, and enhances regime development of regional governance grameworks in international waters. Through adaptive learning methodologies and collaboration with local experts and practitioners, the project develops, promotes and delivers innovative, replicable and targeted experiential learning tools for transboundary water governance for both marine and freshwater ecosystems

project_descr: PIMS 3799 IW MSP:  Good Practices and Portfolio Learning in GEF Transboundary Freshwater and Marine Legal and Institutional Frameworks
